directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook Brussels sprouts in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender, 5 to 6 minutes. Drain.
Mix parsley, lemon zest, and garlic together in a small bowl.
Drizzle butter over cooked Brussels sprouts; sprinkle with parsley mixture, salt, and black pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Brussels Sprouts with Gremolata
